sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO USER(ID, PASSWD, NAME, EMAIL, ROLE, REG_DT) VALUES (#id#, #passwd#, #name#, #email#, #role#, NOW())
sqlMap.select: SELECT ID, PASSWD, NAME, EMAIL, ENABLED, ROLE, REG_DT REGDATE, UPD_DT UPDDATE FROM USER WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE USER SET PASSWD=#passwd#, NAME=#name#, EMAIL=#email# WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ID, PASSWD, NAME, EMAIL, ENABLED, ROLE, REG_DT REGDATE, UPD_DT UPDDATE FROM USER WHERE ROLE != 'MEM'
